label: HKZW-SO01
description: Smart Plug with two USB ports

20.label: Overload Protection
20.description: If current exceeds 16.5A over 5 seconds, relay will turn off.

24.label: Notification on Load Change
24.description: Smart Plug can send notifications to association device load state changes.

27.label: Indicator Modes
27.description: LED in the device will indicate the state of load

151.label: Threshold of power report
151.description: Power Threshold at which to send meter report

152.label: Percentage Threshold of to Trigger Power Report

171.label: Power Report Frequency
171.description: The interval of sending power report to association device (Group Lifeline).

172.label: Energy Report Frequency
172.description: The interval of sending energy report to association device (Group Lifeline).

173.label: Voltage Report Frequency
173.description: The interval of sending voltage report to association device (Group Lifeline)
